short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let's niat achieve goal and closer to ALLAH.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let's niat achieve goal and closer to ALLAH. Management tool for you to achieve goal of world and the hereafter.

This Extension tool help you reminder time for sholat and imsak. Reminder time will appear at every page you visit. it can be hidden using the extension menu. You can also format text size of reminder time at extension menu.

This Extension also will override new tab content. in new tab will help you manage time work or task management for better productivity. the content is under developing and will coming soon.
